gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 116, Spurs 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Spurs, 116-104. Jimmy Butler led the way with his first triple-double of the year with 17 points, 11 rebounds, and 11 assists. It was the sixteenth triple-double of his career. Tyler Herro totaled 24 points, six rebounds, and seven assists as Bam Adebayo added 20 points and five rebounds. Tre Jones (19 points, six assists) and Victor Wembanyama (18 points, 13 rebounds, three assists, one block) led San Antonio in the loss.
